Description:
TITLED BLOCK, LIVE THE BELLARINE LIFESTYLE!
A lifestyle of central township living and coastal relaxation awaits for you with this ideal location of approx. 481m2 parcel of titled residential land. Close enough to the bay for fishing, boating and swimming Whilst being part of the thriving Drysdale community with fantastic Schools, shops, walking tracks and cafes all within a hop, skip and jump of this property. Award winning wineries just down the road, Geelong CBD and a Ferry ride from Portarlington to Melbourne Docklands accessed easily from this location, why would you want to be anywhere else? Enquire today! Call Daniel Lamanna 0413795994
Insights: 7 Serene Terrace, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Serene Estate
A lifestyle opportunity enabling you to thrive and prosper in an intimate residential estate. Residing in this enviable location offers a lifestyle of coastal living, the convenience of a large regional centre within a 20 minute drive and designed around a semi rural, close knit community with every convenience at your doorstep.
The peninsula location is renowned for the idyllic, outdoor lifestyle. Spend a day at the beach, go fishing or enjoy a glass of your favourite wine at one of our many local wineries. The Port Phillip Ferry sails twice daily from Portarlington to South Bank if you fancy a day trip to the city. You will ask yourself why you didn't make the move sooner.
Ground works to commence late 2018.
Selling fast, contact Rhonda Humpage 0457 313609

Description:
Life Is Sweet In Peppermint Grove!
The Feel
If you’re looking for a big family block a short walk to preferred schools and Drysdale township, then this immaculate 4 bedroom, dual living family home is the one you’ve been waiting for! Sitting in a tightly held and peaceful court location on over 1327m2, and surrounded by the friendliest of neighbours, you’re going to enjoy creating a lifetime of memories here. There’s space to extend and room for a pool (STCA), and plenty of scope for changes within; but for now just enjoy time with family and friends knowing you’ve secured this fantastic location!
The Facts
-Spacious 4BR, dual living home nestled by manicured gardens on 1327m2 (approx)
-Kitchen with great storage and benchspace flows to dining and large rumpus
-Covered entertaining deck adjoins open plan living for big family events
-Securely fenced children’s playground with swing set, elevated cubby and monkey bars
-Master BR with beautiful garden views fitted with ensuite and WIR
-Guest BR buds off formal lounge away from the main living hub
-Minor BR wing for the kids sharing a family bathroom and separate WC
-LED lighting, roller blinds to windows, gas ducted heating, SSAC and ceiling fans
-Family friendly floorplan with available plans for future changes if necessary
-DLUG with rear roller door, huge shed with double doors for 6 cars with wood fire
-Long driveway for parking behind secure fencing with extra storage space for a caravan
-Walk to Christian College and Drysdale Primary with bus services at the end of the street
The Owner Loves
“The position has been perfect with Drysdale Primary and easy access to great schools all at the end of the street. Most of our wonderful neighbours have been here for years, and the quiet court location means we have a really great community vibe in the street.”

Description:
The Semi Rural Dream – On The Coast!
Providing more than enough room for a large family to live and grow, this character filled home in a very central position will cater to your every need – now and well into the future! This semi-rural lifestyle will appeal to many, but families will fall in love with the space and modern comforts that come with this updated residence, close to schools and key coastal amenities.
-Updated 4BR family home full of timeless charm and central to all the Bellarine has to offer
-Set across a rare 3599sqm (approx.) within a prestigious semi-rural estate on Drysdale's border
-Families will adore the salt chlorinated heated pool with Astro Turf for all day basking in the sun
-Versatile family floorplan with 3 separate indoor living zones will ensure everyone has their space
-Enormous rear yard is akin to a sports field, a treat for children of all ages to run wild and play!
-Screening trees ensure absolute privacy and a 15x6m shed provides parking for boats and ‘toys'
-Entertaining on a large scale is no problem in the updated kitchen and open plan living zone
-Cook with ease on the SMEG 90cm oven with wide glazed backsplash framing native garden views
-The kitchen forms the central hub with stone tops, island and long breakfast bar with seating
-Bi-fold doors connect dining and family living to the alfresco and pool area for all season fun
-Anytime is a good time for a BBQ with friends, with lock-in café blinds to keep the weather at bay
-Rear living is equipped with a home theatre complete with screen and projector for movie nights
-Private master is treated to a spacious luxury ensuite with freestanding tub and huge WIR
-Minor bedrooms bud off a central hallway sharing access to a formal lounge, study, and bathroom
-Ducted gas heating warms through winter, with SSAC assisting during the summer months
-2000L rainwater tank, vegie beds, and chicken run provide for a semi self-sufficient lifestyle
-DLUG with rear and internal access, with sought after gated side access for a boat or caravan
-Quiet no-through road, within moments of leading colleges and a choice of local primary schools
-10mins to beaches, wineries and coastal towns and a walk to Clifton Springs beach and golf course
-Easy access to Portarlington for the Docklands ferry, with bus connections to Geelong CBD close by
If you've ever considered a lifestyle change, the time is now. Live the semi-rural dream you've always wanted and never look back! Inspection will impress.

Description:
"Kinver"
Hidden amongst native shrubbery sits this charming cedar cottage named “Kinver”. Surrounded by almost 2 acres of land, this home offers a rural lifestyle only moments from the heart of Drysdale and a short drive to Portarlington. The property boasts limitless potential with three bedrooms, spacious open plan living and multiple car spaces, perfect for a family with a business or hobby farm. Convenient and potential-rich opportunities like this rarely present, which the family will love for generations to come.
-Character cedar homestead wrapped by a north and south veranda
-Main entrance for the property is off the quiet end of Collins Street for easy access
-Entertain guests from the spacious kitchen overlooking the living and alfresco areas
-Kitchen features abundant bench and storage space, corner pantry, wall oven and St George cooktop
-Carpeted open plan living area with pitched roof overlooks the enclosed front yard
-Seasonal comfort with a cast iron fireplace, ceiling fan and split system located in the living
-Main bedroom looks out to the garden and features a ceiling fan, en-suite and large walk-in robe
-Two minor bedrooms both contain built-in robes and overlook the native shrubbery
-Country bathroom with a cream and burgundy palette, containing a shower, bath and vanity
-Laundry offers ample storage and space for ultimate organisation
-Double garage seconds as a man-cave with lengthy workbench and cast iron potbelly fireplace
-Three carport spaces are located at the front of the property
-The undercover alfresco offers endless entertaining with cast iron wood oven, in-built bench seats and pond
-Stunning gardens filled with lush natives and succulents offer a colourful and tranquil view
-Enclosed front garden is a perfect and safe play area for children and pets
-Cultivate your own nursery with sectioned hot house and separate fernery
-The enclosed patio features Hills Hoist clothesline, undercover woodshed and dog kennel, and water tank
-A separate open shed acts as a great woodshed or undercover machinery shed
-Another multipurpose shed is ideal for a home business with side and rear access and storage outlets
-Keep your garden green with two oversized water-tanks which irrigate the garden through the reticulation system
-Access the property via vehicle and pedestrian gates on Portarlington Road
-Only a 20 minute drive to Geelong CBD or the Ocean Grove
-Character, potential, space and location give this home the right ingredients for the perfect rural tree-change!
*All information offered by Bellarine Property is provided in good faith. Description:
DOWNSIZE WITHOUT COMPROMISE, HAS STYLE , SPACE AND PRIVACY.......
Architect design townhouse with attention to detail, must view to appreciate this perfect home. Living in this prime residential street you can stroll to the village, parklands and all amenities. The wide entrance creates immediate appeal , natural light and privacy enhance further. Open plan area combines kitchen, living and dining opening to outdoor entertaining and garden, a delightful flexible space. The main bedroom has WIR and large ensuite with BIR's in the other 2, generous bathroom and top laundry. Features include, new kitchen appliances, double glazing, polished floors, 2 split systems, heater, feature lighting, ducted vacuum, dishwasher, high ceilings, loads of storage, double garage and many extras.

Description:
How's The Serenity?
It is very apt that this custom built residence sits proudly at the peak of Serene Terrace as it boasts 'so much serenity' – Darryl Kerrigan. An enviable blue chip land holding of approximately 737m2 within the Central Walk Estate is flanked by established trees creating a truly tranquil setting.
• The executive style residence boasts nothing short of top shelf finishes throughout and is sure to delight a purchaser with an eye for quality; Blackbutt timber flooring, doubled glazed windows, plantation shutters, exposed aggregate concrete, 3000 litre water tank and many more features to be discovered upon inspection
• The primary living area of this property is a beautifully appointed kitchen/family/meals zone; a classic open plan design, a northerly orientation, impressive 2700mm ceiling height and expansive windows deliver a wonderfully light and bright experience. Dual glass sliding doors create a seamless connection to a fully equipped decked alfresco; complete with custom cabinetry (stone benchtops), natural gas point and hot/cold wash.
• The kitchen serves up an appetizing zone; expansive dual 20mm stone benchtops, 900mm gas cooker, stainless steel appliances, custom high gloss cabinetry and a butler's pantry provide excellent storage solutions
• 3 generously proportioned bedrooms, master suite is complete with his/her walk in robe and a luxurious ensuite with oversized shower, his/her vanity and 20mm stone benchtops.
• Bedrooms 2 & 3 are equally generous with built in robes creating a guest wing; serviced by a stylish bathroom suite
• A 2nd independent living area provides further flexibility to what is already an adaptable floor plan
• Fully landscaped gardens with a 'rustic' twist ensures this property sits peacefully within its green leafy surrounds
• As impressive as this property is to the eye, its user friendly nature endorses its unrivalled standing in the property market. An oversized double garage, dual timber gates enable side/rear access to what can only be described as 'the shed' of all sheds. An imposing scale of 10m x 7.6m approx, dual roller door access with towering 3.2m clearance, fully powered complete with 15amp, sealed concrete flooring, toilet/powder room, 16 fluoro lights and custom built in shelving. WOW!!!
• An A+ location places you right in the heart of Drysdale
• Just when you thought it was the impossible dream; enter 31 Serene Terrace, Drysdale

Description:
Serene Estate
A lifestyle opportunity enabling you to thrive and prosper in an intimate residential estate. Residing in this enviable location offers a lifestyle of coastal living, the convenience of a large regional centre within a 20 minute drive and designed around a semi rural, close knit community with every convenience at your doorstep.
The peninsula location is renowned for the idyllic, outdoor lifestyle. Spend a day at the beach, go fishing or enjoy a glass of your favourite wine at one of our many local wineries. The Port Phillip Ferry sails twice daily from Portarlington to South Bank if you fancy a day trip to the city. You will ask yourself why you didn't make the move sooner.
Ground works to commence late 2018.
Selling fast, contact Rhonda Humpage 0457 313609

Description:
Versatility And Tranquillity
The Feel:
Calling all business owners, artists, large families and car enthusiasts! This home is the definition of versatility. Providing a country lifestyle without compromising on space and shedding, this property offers two dwellings plus a large shed and studio. The bordering trees, the chirping birds and established vegetable patch give you a sense of the country, while the shops and schools are only a short walk away. Soak up the peace and tranquillity; take a leisurely walk along the nearby rail trail or potter in the garden – what a lifestyle!
The Facts:
- Sprawling over an acre (approx), surrounded by established trees and gardens
- The main homestead offers three large bedrooms, study and two living areas
- The large kitchen and living area overlook the garden and paved alfresco area
- Master with spacious walk in robe and ensuite
- The new pergola and front deck greet you upon entry of the main home
- Large 3-car garage and workshop with built-in studio, including kitchenette and bathroom
- Self-contained granny flat with kitchen, bathroom, bedroom and living areas
- Ideal for staying guests or residing family, the granny flat is separate from the main house
- The shed and two dwellings are all separately metered, ideal for businesses and shared residences
- Offering a country lifestyle and vistas, while in close proximity to shops and schools
- The north facing rear yard is perfect for any occasion, providing scope for a pool area
- Large property luxuries include a 2.5kL water tank, chicken coup and dog run
- Lush vegetable and herb garden surrounded by established fruit trees
The Vendor Loves....
“We love the country location and feel, and how close it is to everything you need. The shops and schools are only around the corner, and it’s only a short drive into Geelong. The home stays warm in winter and cool in summer, with hardly any use of heaters and coolers. The garden outlook can be seen from every room, which is calming. The variety of birds is sensational! They love the trees and the garden – it gives it a real country feel! The property is well fenced, which is rare on such a large block.”
*All information offered by Bellarine Property is provided in good faith. It is derived from sources believed to be accurate and current as at the date of publication and as such Bellarine Property simply pass this information on. Use of such material is at your sole risk. Perspective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the information that is passed on. Bellarine Property will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information.

Description:
Quality Built Townhouse
Situated amongst quality homes in the sought-after central Drysdale area and within walking distance to public transport, local shopping centre and the beautiful Drysdale recreation reserve. This quality-built townhouse sits on its own title and would be the perfect down-sizer.
Two generous bedrooms with full height BIR, ceiling fans and spacious, semi ensuite bathroom with walk through robe. As well air conditioning to the master bedroom.
Over height ceilings and a beautiful bay window in the living area adds instant appeal. The dining area looks out to the rear garden. Compact kitchen with everything close at hand.
The low-maintenance, compact north facing rear yard has side access to the garden and rear access from the single garage.
Has a strong rental history at $320 per week or can be purchased with vacant possession.

Description:
BOLD & BEAUTIFUL
Located in peaceful Vron Place, away from the hustle and bustle but close to enough to enjoy all local amenities is this fantastic property set on a corner allotment of approx 662m2. Upon entering the home you are immediately greeted by the warmth and comfort of this much loved home with a fabulous design featuring 2 living spaces, a retreat style Master bedroom with WIR and Ensuite and 2 further bedrooms with BIR. There is plenty of room for all of the family! An open plan kitchen, dining and living flow out seamlessly to a large undercover alfresco area, an absolute entertainers delight! With side access and storage space for a boat or caravan as well as a double garage, this property ticks all the boxes for living the Bellarine dream!

Description:
Fairy Tale Setting In Fairview
Let your imagination run wild as you explore the wonderful opportunity this unique property offers;
- A custom-built residence of grand proportions and set on an enviable land holding of approximately 1480m2
- Set within a picturesque green leafy pocket, right in the heart of Drysdale
- Beautiful landscaped gardens and a gorgeous picket-fence create an anticipation for a magical experience
- Upon entry your senses will be excited by an abundance of light and a warm welcoming 'homely' feel
- The kitchen/family/meals area is breathtaking, from its elevated position you feel you are suspended and living amongst the tree tops. Glass sliding doors step out onto an expansive deck which offers enhanced views of tree tops as far as the eye can see. A gas log-fire adds a warm ambience to the open plan living zone
- A well appointed kitchen serves up a practical and user friendly space; excellent storage solutions, a walk in pantry and a wrap around bench top
- An elegant formal lounge/dining room of grand proportions boasts high ceilings, decorative dual french-doors and is bathed in natural light
- An oversized master bedroom suite is complemented by an equally generous ensuite and walk-in-robe. Two additional bedrooms have built in robes and a 4th bedroom/study boasts a stunning bay window feature
- A double remote controlled garage will impress with a raised ceiling height
- Ample under-house storage and a powered work-shop complete the picture
Insights: 10 Fairview Court, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
High Class Living
Located on a quiet corner in Drysdale's heartland, this architecturally designed family home is sure to impress every guest. Its landscaped front garden welcomes all who enter. The home is framed by an entrance corridor, with the first room upon entry being the enormous master bedroom, complete with walk in wardrobe and it's own private bathroom, big enough for a family.
Continuing on, the open plan kitchen, dining and living room area are sure to impress, with the latest in kitchen appliances. The bright central hub of the home with it's high feature ceilings, will keep the whole family comfortable at any time of year with it's own split system heating and cooling and privacy blinds. The main bathroom of the house will be sure to keep the rest of the home happy, equipped with a modern bath, shower and vanity. The remaining two spacious bedrooms have more than enough room for the rest of the family, as well as their own built in robes. Features also include a generous double garage, low maintenance front and back garden and a location only a minute out of Central Drysdale.
